parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The comment. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Default value: Asc. Valid values:

*   Asc
*   Desc

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of records per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The sort field. Default value: Position. Valid values:

*   Name
*   Position

parameters.name: TableId
parameters.description: The table ID. You can refer to the return result of the ListTables operation. and the [Concepts related to metadata entities](~~2880092~~).
